url.title: Url
url.description: The URL of the blog post.

content.title: Content
content.description: The content of the blog post.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the blog post.

posted_at.title: Posted At
posted_at.description: The date and time the blog post was posted.

day_of_week.title: Day Of Week
day_of_week.description: The day of the week, from 1 to 7, where 1 is Monday and 7 is Sunday.

group_id_for_automatically_disable_accou.title: Group Id For Automatically Disable Account

group_id_for_automatically_mark_as_compr.title: Group Id For Automatically Mark As Compromised

group_id_for_automatically_revoke_sessio.title: Group Id For Automatically Revoke Sessions

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Paragraph about the actor, including their username(s), presence on forum(s), total post count, and activity date range (use the 'First Post Date' and 'Last Post Date' fields); if the 'Last Post Date' is more than 90 days before 'Today's Date', mention that the actor has not been active for at least 90 days; if the actor is active on a single forum, avoid exclusive phrasing like “only on” or “exclusively on” and instead use neutral language such as “is active on” or “goes by the username on”.

main_activities_and_motives.title: Main Activities And Motives
main_activities_and_motives.description: Paragraph about the main activies and motives of the actor. Base your assessment only on the 'General description of the threat actor's activity on the forum' section of the input.

latest_activity.title: Latest Activity
latest_activity.description: Short but specific and precise analysis of the threat actor's latest activity (highlighting any named moderators, admins, dates, or type of activity), (always translate everything in English, all examples or output should be always in English). Base your assessment only on the 'Latest activity from the threat actor' section of the input.

potential_associations_with_major_crimin.title: Potential Associations With Major Criminal Groups
potential_associations_with_major_crimin.description: What groups the threat actor is associated with (if any). Base your assessment only on the 'General description of the threat actor's activity on the forum' section of the input.

linguistic_analysis.title: Linguistic Analysis
linguistic_analysis.description: Identify all languages present in the 'Analysis of the threat actor’s writing style' section, and do not omit any language even if it appears rarely (e.g., greetings, slang, or isolated phrases). For each detected language, provide its name, a proficiency rating from 1 to 10, a confidence rating from 1 to 10 (reduced if fewer than 100 posts are analyzed), and a short justification of 2–3 sentences. Present the results in a structured paragraph format, with one entry per language, and end with a brief summary sentence explaining whether the actor appears multilingual or primarily focused on one language.

likely_geographical_location.title: Likely Geographical Location
likely_geographical_location.description: Identify the likely geography and give a confidence rating (1-10). When you have under 300 posts to analyse, mark confidence in your assessment as low and adjust the confidence score accordingly. Base your assessment only on the 'Description of the posting activity of the threat actor' section of the input.

potential_victims_shortlist.title: Potential Victims Shortlist
potential_victims_shortlist.description: List up to ten victims, showing only their names (plus industry if relevant). Base your assessment only on the 'Description of potential victims mentioned in the threat actor's post' section of the input. Paragraph about the potential victim.

bank.title: Bank
bank.description: The bank associated with the leaked credit card.

bin.title: Bin
bin.description: The BIN (Bank Identification Number) of the credit card.

brand.title: Brand
brand.description: The brand of the leakedcredit card. Ex: VISA

country.title: Country
country.description: The country the leakedcredit card was issued in.

expiration.title: Expiration
expiration.description: The expiration date of the leaked credit card.

owner.title: Owner
owner.description: The owner of the leaked credit card.

state_code.title: State Code
state_code.description: The state code tied to the leaked credit card.

zip.title: Zip
zip.description: The zip code tied to the leaked credit card.

has_cvv.title: Has Cvv
has_cvv.description: Whether the CVV was included in the leaked data.

has_date_of_birth.title: Has Date Of Birth
has_date_of_birth.description: Whether the date of birth was included in the leaked data.

has_mother_maiden_name.title: Has Mother Maiden Name
has_mother_maiden_name.description: Whether the mother's maiden name was included in the leaked data.

has_phone.title: Has Phone
has_phone.description: Whether the phone number was included in the leaked data.

has_pin.title: Has Pin
has_pin.description: Whether the card's PIN was included in the leaked data.

has_ssn.title: Has Ssn
has_ssn.description: Whether the card owner's SSN was included in the leaked data.

has_track_1.title: Has Track 1
has_track_1.description: Whether the card's track 1 (magnetic stripe data) was included in the leaked data.

has_vbv.title: Has Vbv
has_vbv.description: Whether the card's VBV (Verified by Visa) data was included in the leaked data.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Begin by describing the actor’s most impactful criminal activity. Then provide an overview of the general nature of the actor’s activity, including up to 20 short, unique, and relevant examples in reverse chronological order (e.g., what is offered, at what price, on which date, and on which forum/source). For each example, cite the corresponding post, date, and source, translating all content into English. When applicable, include details on tools, exploits, pricing, communication style, and any unique skills demonstrated.

variation_of_activity_over_time.title: Variation Of Activity Over Time
variation_of_activity_over_time.description: Describe how the actor's tactics, type of activity or targets have changed over time, if applicable.

affiliations.title: Affiliations
affiliations.description: List groups, services, malware strains or RaaS programmes the actor is linked to.

non_criminal_activity.title: Non Criminal Activity
non_criminal_activity.description: Summarise behaviour that is clearly non-criminal.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Paragraph about the general description of the actor activity, using the high level context of the actor to produce your analysis.

main_activities_and_motives.title: Main Activities And Motives
main_activities_and_motives.description: A concise, analytical paragraph describing the actor's main activities, technical sophistication indicators, and specific threats to sectors. Write in a narrative style without numbered lists or bullet points. Keep it shorter and more focused than a detailed breakdown.

potential_associations.title: Potential Associations
potential_associations.description: Paragraph about the potential associations of the actor if relevant. Identify what groups the actor is associated with (if any). If none are identified, state that clearly.

general_analysis.title: General Analysis
general_analysis.description: Provide an overview of the actor’s activity, including: the total number of posts and the forums where they were made, the years or range of years the actor was active, and any gaps or seasonal trends in posting activity.

precise_analysis.title: Precise Analysis
precise_analysis.description: Outline the actor’s hourly activity and inactivity periods, explain how these align with the chosen UTC time zone, and indicate the most likely location with a confidence level and three example countries (If the dataset is fewer than 300 posts, mark confidence as low and adjust the score accordingly).

hour.title: Hour
hour.description: The hour of the day, from 0 to 23.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: The domain of the lookalike domain.

registered_at.title: Registered At
registered_at.description: The date and time the lookalike domain was registered.

identifier_domains.title: Identifier Domains
identifier_domains.description: Domain identifiers matching the lookalike domains

feed.title: Feed
feed.description: The feed where the lookalike domain was found

cert_data.title: Cert Data
cert_data.description: The certificate data of the lookalike domain.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: The subject of the certificate of the lookalike domain.

issuer.title: Issuer
issuer.description: The issuer of the certificate of the lookalike domain.

malware_family.title: Malware Family
malware_family.description: The malware family used for device infection.

build_id.title: Build Id
build_id.description: The build ID of the malware used for device infection.

file_location.title: File Location
file_location.description: The file location of the malware used for device infection.

infected_at.title: Infected At
infected_at.description: The date and time the malware was used to infect the victim's device.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Single paragraph providing an analytical summary of the post.

actor_intent.title: Actor Intent
actor_intent.description: Single paragraph summarizing the actor's intent. If the actor's intent is not clear, return None.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL of the ransom leak post.

response_url.title: Response Url
response_url.description: The URL of the response to the ransom leak post.

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the ransom leak post.

content.title: Content
content.description: The content of the ransom leak post.

body.title: Body
body.description: The body of the ransom leak post.

victim_information.description: The information relating to the victim of the ransom leak.

sentiment_analysis.title: Sentiment Analysis
sentiment_analysis.description: Single paragraph analyzing the sentiment in the replies.

victim_information.description: Collection of data that relates to the victim and their infected device.

malware_information.description: Collection of data that relates to the malware that was used to infect the victim's device.

top_actors.title: Top Actors
top_actors.description: Single paragraph summarizing the most active actors in the forum thread.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username of account accessed on the infected device.

country_code.title: Country Code
country_code.description: The country code tied to the infected device.

hwid.title: Hwid
hwid.description: The hardware ID of the infected device.

current_language.title: Current Language
current_language.description: The current language selected on the infected device.

screensize_width.title: Screensize Width
screensize_width.description: The width of the screen in pixels.

screensize_height.title: Screensize Height
screensize_height.description: The height of the screen in pixels.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: The timezone of the infected device.

os.title: Os
os.description: The operating system of the infected device.

uac.title: Uac
uac.description: The user account control (UAC) setting of the infected device.

process_elevation.title: Process Elevation
process_elevation.description: Whether operations during infection were elevated to administrator privileges.

available_keyboards.title: Available Keyboards
available_keyboards.description: The available keyboard layouts on the infected device.

hardware.title: Hardware
hardware.description: The hardware components of the infected device.

anti_viruses.title: Anti Viruses
anti_viruses.description: The anti-viruses installed on the infected device.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the victim. This is the name of the company or organization that was breached.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: The domain of the victim. This is the domain of the company or organization that was breached.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description: The industry of the company or organization that was breached.

employee_count.title: Employee Count
employee_count.description: The number of employees of the company or organization that was breached.

city.title: City
city.description: The city of operation of the company or organization that was breached.

state.title: State
state.description: The state of operation of the company or organization that was breached.

country.title: Country
country.description: The country of operation of the company or organization that was breached.
